group_1.textRight: It's been a while, Kagome. Have you made any@progress with your writing?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes, I have.
It's all starting to come together, so I'll be going@over my work with the professor.

group_1.textRight: That's great!
But we have to be careful about publicizing@Magical Girls, what with Yukuni City...
Our first order of business is building a solid@foundation for people to believe in them.

group_1.textLeft: There are actually people from Yukuni City@here right now.

group_1.textRight: What for?
Is this related to why you wanted me to come@to the Coordinator's shop?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, please come inside right away...!

group_1.textCenter: Now then, on with the questions!@How did you two get together?

group_1.textRight: It's not like that. I'm merely a servant@for Lady Nayuta's family.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, she simply lives with me to do@our household chores...
Hold it right there! Doesn't this sound like you@forced your way in?

group_1.textRight: How very bold of you.

group_1.textLeft: So Rabi moved herself right into Nayuta's home@and took over the housework...

group_1.textRight: Yes, it's quite the high-level play...@It leaves me speechless.
I'm just working a typical day job...

group_1.textLeft: Rabi, what kind of interrogation is this...?

group_1.textRight: I have no idea...

group_1.textLeft: Um, why is she asking about their@relationship...?
And where are Shizuka and the others?

group_1.textRight: They left before the interrogation started,@right when I got involved...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?
If I may explain...
This is a panel called the "Welcome New@Couples Corner."

group_1.textRight: A panel?

group_1.textLeft: From what I gather, a new romance has bloomed@within the Kamihama Student Conference.
A couple has overcome the East and West divide,@so they wanted to commemorate them.
I believe Mitama has been central to organizing@this project.

group_1.textRight: And get this, Rabi got caught up in it@as a test subject.

group_1.textLeft: And Nayutan, too!

group_1.textCenter: Managing Nayuta's meals, cleaning her house,@doing her laundry, taking control of her schedule,
all to the point she can't manage to live@without you...
You've ensnared her in a marriage trap,@haven't you?

group_1.textRight: Wh...what...?

group_1.textLeft: That is absolutely not the case!

group_1.textCenter: How...how is THIS supposed@to welcome them...?

group_1.textLeft: It's not strictly a welcoming, Tamaki.

group_1.textRight: Oh, Kanagi...@What do you mean by that...?

group_1.textLeft: Our purpose is to procure as much information@about the couple as possible.

group_1.textRight: Because...they're from the East and West?

group_1.textLeft: No. It's because the young man to be@interviewed is my younger brother.
Had it been any other couple, I would welcome@them normally and leave it at that.
But given that my own brother is involved,@I can't help but be concerned.
Moreover, the fact he has a sweetheart leaves@me unusually on edge...
So I started brainstorming a way we could@resolve our concerns,
and came up with the idea to interview@the new lovebirds!
*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: I feel like you'd exhaust everyone involved@if you did that...

group_1.textLeft: Phew… We're free at last...

group_1.textRight: Great work, you guys!

group_1.textLeft: Just hearing the sound of your voice@lifts my spirits...

group_1.textRight: I'm really sorry...@I had no idea this would happen...

group_1.textLeft: No, it's not your fault... I should have known@what to expect from Mitama,
but I couldn't handle it.@It was my blunder…
After Puella Care left, we figured we could rely@on her from now on.
She really put you through your paces@there, huh?

group_1.textRight: To be honest, though...and I've said this before,@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:lipSynch_1][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:100101:motion_100]But this actually makes me feel relieved.

group_1.textLeft: How so?

group_1.textRight: Because it means Mitama and Kanagi believe@in Kamihama's future.
And I'm glad you four seem to be at peace, too.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, and rightly so.
After all this time, Kurara and I are finally@friends again.
Now that we're all a team, our next step is@to publicize the truth of Magical Girls.
Everyone's working together to make@that happen.

group_1.narration: It somehow seems a little absurd.@Happy days keep going by.
And not just for me,@but for all the other Magical Girls, too.
It's strange, though.@It feels like happiness is all there is.@It makes me feel restless, but...@I can't find it in myself to leave@this place, either...

group_1.textCenter: This is the future we wanted.
